text: Kare-ra (makka no hitobito) wa, sono kaimei o matsu igai ni wanai. Sono kaimei ga okonawa reru hi ni natte,-saki ni kore o keishi shite ita mono wa iudearou. `Omo no shito-tachi wa, tashikani shinri o tsutaeta noda. Mukashi kare-ra ga watashi-tachi no tame ni torinashita yō ni, torinasu mono wa nai no ka. Soretomo watashi-tachi wa (chijō no seikatsu ni) kaesa rete, watashi-tachi ga shinakatta okonai o suru koto ga dekinai no ka.' Jissai ni, kare-ra wa jibun no tamashī o horoboshi, katte ni tsukuriagete ita mono-tachi wa kare-ra kara sugata o keshite shimatta
